name: Spaceship Invasion (SpeedGamesDevelopment)
description:
(Endless Mode) The Endless Mode is a wave-based round mode, all 5 waves a new Enemy can spawn up to 5 different enemies.

(Story not finish)YOU have to free the Tesla from a distant spaceship because EVIL shot robots want to dismantle it to steal the technology from Tesla. You must prevent this immediately.

Discord name:

Scraplp (Tarek Laun)

Jet1 (Kevin Kröger)
